title: Couldn't Connect to 2 games in a row

embed.description: Post with 1 votes and 2 views. Shared by karuaan. Couldn't Connect to LOL

body: After champion select, I get the screen that says "Game in progress" but the game loading screen never pop-ups until after the game is remade. Then after a while, I get a message saying "The Game is no longer running. Play a new game." while I get a leaver buster and lose LP. The second time I tried to close and restart the client to have the game loading screen pop-up but the same thing happened this time around.

replies.body: I looked into your account to see what happened exactly, and it seems that your team voted for an early surrender in your ranked Nasus game.  Since the match ended early, it was no longer active.  Getting a loss and leaver for that sucks, and I highly recommend running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, as it seems like your connection to the game server is in trouble.  I hope that helps!
